CustomField.formula: IF( DATETIMEVALUE(Legacy_Partner_Program_Ts_Cs_Date__c) >= DATETIMEVALUE( TODAY() - 365 ) , "Less than a year", IF( AND(DATETIMEVALUE(Legacy_Partner_Program_Ts_Cs_Date__c) <= DATETIMEVALUE( TODAY() - 365 ), DATETIMEVALUE(Legacy_Partner_Program_Ts_Cs_Date__c) >= DATETIMEVALUE( TODAY() - 365*3 ) ) , "More than 1 year", IF( AND(DATETIMEVALUE(Legacy_Partner_Program_Ts_Cs_Date__c) < DATETIMEVALUE( TODAY() - 365*3 ), DATETIMEVALUE(Legacy_Partner_Program_Ts_Cs_Date__c) >= DATETIMEVALUE( TODAY() - 365*5 ) ) , "More than 3 years", IF( AND(DATETIMEVALUE(Legacy_Partner_Program_Ts_Cs_Date__c) < DATETIMEVALUE( TODAY() - 365*5 ), DATETIMEVALUE(Legacy_Partner_Program_Ts_Cs_Date__c) >= DATETIMEVALUE( TODAY() - 365*10 ) ) , "More than 5 years", IF( AND(DATETIMEVALUE(Legacy_Partner_Program_Ts_Cs_Date__c) < DATETIMEVALUE( TODAY() - 365*10 ), DATETIMEVALUE(Legacy_Partner_Program_Ts_Cs_Date__c) >= DATETIMEVALUE( TODAY() - 365*15 ) ),"More than 10 years", IF(DATETIMEVALUE(Legacy_Partner_Program_Ts_Cs_Date__c) <= DATETIMEVALUE( TODAY() - 365*15 ),"More than 15 years","") )))))
CustomField.label: Experience with us
